short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your daily reply goals on X.com and grow your audience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a reply counter for X.com (formerly known as Twitter) that resets daily. It helps you grow your audience consistently and keep track of the amount of replies you've made.

1. Install, enable and pin Reply Tally
2. Reply consistently each day
3. Grow your audience on X.com
